General.Name: Hangzhou Xili Intelligent Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Hangzhou Xili Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of smart electricity meters in China. It offers single-phase and three-phase smart meters, concentrators, collectors, power consumption information collection terminals, and electric energy metering box products, including special transformer collection terminals. The company also provides gas and water meters. Hangzhou Xili Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. was formerly known as Hangzhou Xili Watthour Meter Manufacture Co. Ltd. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
